name: openzwave-shared
description: Node.JS bindings for OpenZWave including management and security functions

scripts.preinstall: apt-get update; apt-get install -y libudev-dev pkg-config; git clone https://github.com/OpenZWave/open-zwave.git deps/open-zwave/; cd deps/open-zwave; git checkout 98c3bde5910edd01a7efca8303146449159b221b; make && make install; ldconfig /usr/local/lib

author: Elias Karakoulakis <elias.karakoulakis@gmail.com>
